item.description:
Our November 14, 2011 speaker,  Sarah Johnson, website strategist and principal of etruro.com, will speak on "How to Make Your Website Work Harder." Topics will include affordable solutions, usability, search engine optimization and simple shopping carts.


Arrive as early as 6:30 to network with others. The meeting starts promptly at 7:00. A map of MIT showing the meeting location is here.  Street parking is suggested on Ames Street or Memorial Drive. Most MIT buildings have easy access and are interconnected. For more about the Inventors Association of New England, go to our website at www.inventne.com
item.name: Inventors Association of New England Monthly Meetup
